name: Fae
description:
Fae is a cat who got lost on her way home... Explore a mysterious atmospheric world while helping her get back. 

Controls

Keyboard: A, D or Left Arrow, Right Arrow to walk. Space to jump.

Controller: Thumbstick and Y/Triangle (uppermost face button). 

(Hint: [SPOILER] Collect all of Fae's lost items to be able to enter your home. [SPOILER])

All artwork and audio created from scratch during the Jam.
